stories.currentRole: #1 Ranked Professional Tennis Player & Sports Commentator
stories.storyTldr: From SSES courts to world #1, won 4 Grand Slam titles
stories.achievement: Former world #1 tennis player with 4 Grand Slam titles, now ESPN commentator
stories.quote: Saint Stephen's taught me discipline and focus that carried me to the top of professional tennis

stories.storyTldr: SSES grad now leads the world's largest professional network
stories.achievement: CEO of LinkedIn, leading 20,000+ employees and 950M+ members globally
stories.quote: The critical thinking skills I developed at Saint Stephen's prepared me to lead in Silicon Valley

stories.storyTldr: Founded CrowdTangle, acquired by Facebook for millions
stories.achievement: Founded CrowdTangle, social analytics platform acquired by Facebook in 2016
stories.quote: SSES encouraged me to think differently - that entrepreneurial mindset led to CrowdTangle

stories.storyTldr: SSES science student now analyzes samples for NASA missions
stories.achievement: Analytical Chemist at NASA working on space exploration missions
stories.quote: The labs at Saint Stephen's sparked my passion for chemistry that took me to NASA

stories.currentRole: Managing Director, Global Head of Software Banking at Morgan Stanley
stories.storyTldr: From SSES to leading global software banking at Morgan Stanley
stories.achievement: Managing Director at Morgan Stanley, leading software banking globally
stories.quote: Saint Stephen's taught me to excel in male-dominated fields - now I lead at the highest levels of finance

stories.storyTldr: SSES performer now on world stages from Coachella to MTV
stories.achievement: Performed at Coachella, MTV Video Music Awards, and Ellen DeGeneres Show
stories.quote: The performing arts program at SSES gave me the confidence to perform on the world's biggest stages

stories.currentRole: Fox Sports TV Host & Golf Channel Personality
stories.storyTldr: SSES athlete turned nationally recognized sports broadcaster
stories.achievement: Fox Sports TV host and Golf Channel personality covering major sporting events
stories.quote: Being a student-athlete at Saint Stephen's prepared me for the competitive world of sports media

stories.currentRole: NFL Player & All-Big Ten Football Star
stories.storyTldr: SSES football star now playing in the NFL
stories.achievement: All-Big Ten football player at University of Illinois, drafted to NFL
stories.quote: The foundation I built at Saint Stephen's carried me from high school to the NFL

stories.storyTldr: SSES student council member now serving as city mayor
stories.achievement: Elected Mayor of Melbourne Village, serving her community in public office
stories.quote: Leadership lessons from Saint Stephen's guide my work serving our community as mayor

stories.storyTldr: From SSES debate team to presiding as court judge
stories.achievement: Appointed Court Judge for the Second Judicial District
stories.quote: The critical thinking and ethics I learned at SSES are essential to my work on the bench

stories.storyTldr: SSES grad protecting America as decorated FBI agent
stories.achievement: FBI Supervisory Special Agent awarded the Meritorious Achievement Medal
stories.quote: The integrity and discipline instilled at Saint Stephen's prepared me for the FBI
